title: CompTIA Network+ Certification
description: Comprehensive networking course covering network infrastructure, operations, security, and troubleshooting. Prepare for CompTIA Network+ N10-008 exam.

instructor.name: LEARN-IT-ALL Team
instructor.bio: Certified network engineers with extensive industry experience

chapters.title: Chapter 1: Networking Fundamentals
chapters.description: OSI model, TCP/IP, protocols, and network topologies

chapters.title: Chapter 2: Network Implementations
chapters.description: Ethernet, switching, VLANs, and routing fundamentals

chapters.title: Chapter 3: Network Operations
chapters.description: Documentation, monitoring tools, and network management

chapters.title: Chapter 4: Network Security
chapters.description: Threats, vulnerabilities, firewalls, and security best practices

chapters.title: Chapter 5: IP Addressing and Subnetting
chapters.description: IPv4, IPv6, CIDR notation, and subnet calculations

chapters.title: Chapter 6: Wireless Networking
chapters.description: WiFi standards, security protocols, and wireless troubleshooting

chapters.title: Chapter 7: Cloud and Datacenter
chapters.description: Cloud services, virtualization, and datacenter technologies

chapters.title: Chapter 8: WAN Technologies
chapters.description: MPLS, VPNs, cellular technologies, and remote access

chapters.title: Chapter 9: Network Troubleshooting
chapters.description: Troubleshooting methodology, tools, and common issues

chapters.title: Chapter 10: Exam Preparation
chapters.description: Practice exams, performance-based questions, and study strategies

learningObjectives: Design and implement IP addressing schemes
Work with cloud and virtualization technologies
Pass CompTIA Network+ N10-008 certification exam
